zh.title: 黄金/美元技术分析：震荡整理中待突破
zh.content:
当前，黄金/美元（XAU/USD）价格保持在4978附近，短期内呈现震荡整理格局。日内价格波动较小，最高触及4981.1，最低跌至4969.56，显示出市场尚未找到明确的方向。基于当前价格，黄金面临较强的横盘整理压力，尚未形成明显的上涨或下跌趋势。

技术指标方面，RSI（14）缺失使得我们无法从超买或超卖角度评估市场的买卖强度。而MACD呈现负值（-21.01），显示出卖方力量较强，短期内可能继续维持弱势走势。SMA(20)保持在4983.06一线，提供了短期内的一个参考阻力位，当前价格依然低于此水平，未能突破。

支撑位方面，4969.56的低点为近期的关键支撑，若跌破此位置，黄金可能会进一步下探至4950附近。而在阻力方面，4983一带的SMA(20)为重要的压制区，若突破该位，可能会重新测试5000关口的上方区域。

建议交易者关注4969.56的支撑和4983的阻力，若价格突破4983，则可考虑追多；若下破4969.56，则短期内看空，谨慎操作。

en.title: Gold vs US Dollar Technical Analysis
en.content:
The XAU/USD pair is currently in a consolidation phase, trading near the recent high of 4981.10405. With a modest 24-hour change of 0.06%, the market appears to be lacking strong directional momentum. The price is hovering just below the 20-period SMA of 4983.058270, indicating that short-term market sentiment may be slightly bearish. However, the proximity to the upper boundary of the range suggests that a breakout to the upside could be a possibility if bullish momentum emerges. 

The MACD value of -21.011154 indicates bearish pressure in the market, with the lack of a signal line preventing further clarity on potential reversals. A negative MACD suggests that the market remains under the influence of sellers, but no clear trend has been established yet. Given the absence of a reliable RSI reading, traders may need to rely more on price action to confirm any shift in market sentiment. Caution is recommended for new entries until a clear direction emerges.

From a support/resistance perspective, the key level to watch is the recent low of 4969.56386, which offers support in the near term. A break below this level could signal a deeper correction, with potential targets around 4950. On the upside, the resistance near 4981.10405 remains a critical level. A breakout above this could lead to further gains toward the 5000 psychological level, signaling a shift in sentiment towards bullishness.

Traders may consider waiting for a confirmation of a breakout or a rebound from support before entering trades. With the current market conditions, a cautious approach is advisable, with possible buy positions above 4981.10405 and sell positions below 4969.56386. Patience and attention to key levels will be crucial in navigating this range-bound market.
